"Thank you for sending me the important document for feedback. I have received it and am reviewing it now. Once I have a chance to go through it, I will provide my thoughts and any necessary feedback. Please be patient as I take my time with this and appreciate your trust in me."

This response maintains a positive tone and reassures your sibling about the importance of the document and your commitment to thorough consideration.
